channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OK

item.title: Report X-2023090948
item.description:
Report X-2023090948

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-19T15:12:03+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-18
  • City: EDMOND
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found in the unload at NOKC 732 wet from a bottle of CloroxPro Germicidal Bleach Concentrated that had a loose cap. Package was placed into a red tote with a hazmat bag. DescribePack: Box was wet and ripped/torn open. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed into a red tote with a hazmat bag.
